snippet: Peru's counter-narcotics police broke up a ring that shipped cocaine from Lima's international airport to Mexico on commercial flights by swapping out unsuspecting passengers' luggage with identical suitcases, their commander announced Thursday....

headline.print_headline: Peru Drug Police Break Up Cocaine Ring at Airport
headline.main: Peru Drug Police Break Up Cocaine Ring at Airport

lead_paragraph: Peru's counter-narcotics police broke up a ring that shipped cocaine from Lima's international airport to Mexico on commercial flights by swapping out unsuspecting passengers' luggage with identical suitcases, their commander announced Thursday.
